data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Joypurhat to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Joypurhat, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,145 believers in Joypurhat to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, show your mercy on the 912,655 people in Joypurhat who are far from you. Please add 182 new house churches this year.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Joypurhat, Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help the people of the the county of Joypurhat to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Joypurhat, Rajshahi, Bangladesh that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Joypurhat, Rajshahi, Bangladesh by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
